member.name: ID3D12VideoProcessCommandList1.ProcessFrames1
member.summary: Records a video processing operation to the command list, operating on one or more input samples and writing the result to an output surface. This version of the method supports changing the for each call, unlike .
member.param: A pointer to an interface representing a video processor instance.
A structure specifying the output surface and output arguments.
A pointer to an array of structures specifying the input parameters.

member.name: ID3D12VideoProcessCommandList1
member.summary: Encapsulates a list of graphics commands for video processing. Adds the method which supports changing the for each call, unlike .
